summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 1.9°C) and outside temperature (up 1.5°C) and more moisture-laden rainfall (up 3.2 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 9553 lux) and cloud levels (up 326 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 14960 lux), cloud levels (up 1905 m), feels like temperature (up 1.5°C), and outside temperature (up 2.1°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 325.7m lower than yesterday, 829.4m lower than the past week, 1905.1m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels for yesterday ranged from 713m to 1594m and averaged 741.2m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; mild and pleasant. Also, very clammy and humid and little or no wind. Some rain can be expected, occasional overcast conditions, and it’s dim outside. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
